SELECT
FROM b_build_building_info a left join b_build_building bb on bb.id = a.build_id left join b_members m on m.wxOpenId=a.wxopenid
and a.number like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY a.created desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `b_build_building_info` (`id`, `build_id`, `wxopenid`, `number`, `words`, `success`,`created`) VALUES (#{id},#{buildId},#{wxopenid},(select ifnull(max(bi.number),0)+1 from b_build_building_info bi where bi.build_id=#{buildId}),#{words},#{success},null);
mapper.select: select count(0) from b_build_building_info bi where bi.success=true and bi.build_id=#{buildId} and bi.wxopenid=#{wxopenid}
